original_text: “If anyone sins and is unfaithful to the Lord by deceiving a neighbor about something entrusted to them or left in their care or about something stolen, or if they cheat their neighbor,
korean_text: 누구든지 여호와께 신실하지 못하여 범죄하되 곧 이웃이 맡긴 물건이나 전당물을 속이거나 도둑질하거나 착취하고도 사실을 부인하거나

sentences.original_text: If anyone sins and is unfaithful to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 죄를 짓고 주에게 신실하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: by deceiving a neighbor about something entrusted to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 맡겨진 것에 대해 이웃을 속임으로써
또는 그들의 돌봄 아래 맡겨진 것

sentences.original_text: or if they cheat their neighbor
